about_the_game:
Face relentless waves of giant insects, aliens, and zombies in a fight for survival. Customize your build with an arsenal of unique weapons and power-ups, and harness the game's unique planetary perspective to outmaneuver your enemies and turn the tide of battle. How long can you last against the cosmic onslaught?

You are a skilled bounty hunter with a powerful tank, hired by planets desperate to reclaim their land from invaders. Your mission: exterminate the monstrous threats and make the planets habitable for settlers.

For every monster you eliminate, you earn a bounty, which can be used to upgrade your weapons, tank, and abilities—allowing you to tackle even greater challenges and amass even greater rewards.

Burn them with a flamethrower!, exterminate them with guided missiles and cannon projectiles!, protect from enemy bullets with your energy shield

Features

  • Twin-stick shooter

  • Real spherical mini planets arenas

  • Fast runs (under 30 minutes)

  • Dozens of weapons and powerups to choose from

  • Local Co-op for up to 2 players

  • Collect coins to get items from the shop between waves of enemies

  • Unlockable game modes

  • Different difficulty levels so everybody can enjoy it

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Panzer Planet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Fast-paced, twin sticker, top-down arena shooter with roguelite elements, where you pilot a powerful tank on spherical mini planets to fight hordes of zombies and monsters. Collect your bounty for killing your enemies to get new weapons and powerups to improve your skills.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian
